points.title: Segwit update
points.description: Segregated Witness protocol update increases block capacity and improves scalability by separating signature data from transaction data.

points.title: Taproot update
points.description: Taproot Bitcoin protocol update enhances privacy, efficiency, and smart contract capabilities through a new signature scheme called Schnorr Signatures.

points.title: Ordinals
points.description: Ordinals protocol inscribes unique digital artifacts directly onto individual Satoshis on the Bitcoin blockchain, enabling NFT-like functionality.

title.subtitle: A manual for joining the Bitlayer ecosystem By builders for builders

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc1: Bitlayer acts as a Layer 2 solution for Bitcoin, boasting 100% EVM and Ethereum toolchain compatibility, with BTC as native token(gas token). Bitlayer can enable applications and developers from the existing Ethereum ecosystem to migrate to Bitlayer at low cost, eliminating the need for substantial modifications or rewrites.
faq.name2: Is Bitlayer compatible with existing Bitcoin wallets?
faq.desc2: Yes, Bitlayer is compatible with existing wallets such as Metamask, Unisat, or other Bitcoin/Ethereum-compatible wallets, allowing users to seamlessly interact with their funds and assets on the Bitlayer network.
faq.name3: Can developers migrate their existing projects to Bitlayer?
faq.desc3: Yes, Bitlayer supports existing developers by offering EVM compatibility, allowing for seamless migration and deployment of existing projects at low costs. Developers can have the ease of migrating smart contracts written in Solidity, Vyper, or any other language that compiles EVM bytecode directly to Bitlayer, using the toolchain you are familiar with: Ethereum JSON-RPC, Hardhat, etc.
faq.name4: How can I help support Bitlayer?
faq.desc4: `There are several ways to support Bitlayer. You can actively participate in community discussions, provide feedback and suggestions, contribute to the development of applications or tools on the platform, or promote Bitlayer to others who may benefit from its services. Additionally, you can explore any specific support initiatives or programs that Bitlayer may have in place. Click to know more about Ready Player One, a program unlocks $50,000,000 in incentives for early builders and contributors.`

rules.rules1: Earn 300 points daily by completing three votes.
rules.rules2: Follow the official Twitter to receive 500 points.
rules.rules3: Each new user invited to vote successfully adds an extra 500 points to your tally.
rules.rules4: A random draw will award 100 Bitlayer Lucky Helmets, with higher rankings increasing your chances.
rules.note: Join the Bitlayer Popularity List voting to support your favorite projects! Event period: April 23, 2024, to May 10, 2024. Log in daily to the leaderboard page, with each person having three voting opportunities per day. Earn extra points by following the official Twitter and inviting new users. Active participants will accumulate Ready Player I event points and have the chance to be whitelisted for the Bitlayer Lucky Helmet.
rules.boost: `Boost your project's popularity, influence the final leaderboard rankings, and actively participate to win official NFT rewards!`
